Trigger.Name: set e
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 盗龙形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 猛豹形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 猛豹形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 盗龙形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 魔猿形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 魔猿形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 猛豹形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: 义结金兰
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 红莲极意

Trigger.Name: 红莲
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>.+?) gains the effect of 猛豹形 from .+? for 15.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: 起手红莲触发换姿态加斗气
1使用说明
Trigger.Description:
特性 按1自动打循环 自动红莲爆发、支持手动拖延 自动打斗气、苍气炮 起手自动加斗气 身位提醒
默认按键位置： --GCD技能需要宏 连击 双龙 正拳 双掌 破碎 崩拳 7 8 9 0 - =
--oGCD技能不需要宏 苍气炮 斗气 红莲 义结金兰 f 2 c v
宏写法： /hotbar set 技能 current 1 /e 红莲暂停
红莲暂停后会在下次破碎拳之前尝试释放
起手红莲、震脚*3，脚本自动上斗气。 破碎无我之后，等2层疾风迅雷，按1正常循环
震脚已抠除
